mapper.select: select * from drone where dro_no in (select dro_no from possesion where dro_no is not null) order by dro_no desc
select d.*, p.*, r.* from drone d, possesion p, rental r where d.dro_no=p.dro_no and p.ren_no=r.ren_no and d.dro_no = #{dro_no}
